All about MyToDoList:
Main Screen
nav menu
Add and Edit
Here you will find a description for each menu item in the Main screen:
This icon will retrieve all items in the current list.
This checkbox will filter only the checked items in the current list.
The highligter icon will mark a selected task(s) as done by highlighting them.
The filter by type icon will display only the groceries whithin the grocery types selected in the filter.
The search icon allows you to search for some text contained in the task or grocery description.
The delete icon erease selected tasks from the current list, including the Archived list.
The archive icon will send the selected task to the Archived list and remove it from the current list.
The settings icon opens a new window to configure some app preferences such as app color theme, date format and language.
Here you will find a description for each menu item in the Add and Edit task screen:
In this text field you can input a descrioption of a task or name for a grocery.
This is a dropdown menu that will display all the task categories or grocery types available in the app.
This is a dropdown menu that will display all the task priorities available in the app.
Is Appointment?: This checkbox will show or hide date and hour fields to specify when the task is due.
This icon will display a calendar on your screen so a date for fulfilling the task is picked out.
This icon will display a clock on your screen so a time for fulfilling the task is pikecd out.
This text field allows you to input some extra details about your task.
The Save menu icon allows you to save a new task or save changes on an existing task.
The Cancel menu icon allows you to discard a new item that has not been created yet or to discard changes on an existing one.
Here you will find a description for each menu item in the Navigation menu:
The Menu Icon on the top left corner of the main screen will give you access to the navigation menu.
The All list icon will display all the taks in the app (including all categories but the Grocery category).
The Grocery list icon will display all the groceries in the app (some filter may apply).
The Generic task list is assign to any other list that can be added or removed from the app. This will display the tasks for this category.
The Archived list icon will display all the archived tasks in the app.
The Add list icon will allow you to add new task lists (Task Category).
The Delete list icon will allow you to remoce an existing task lists (Task Category), except the All, Groceries and Archived lists.
